snippet: Bahrain handed out life sentences on Monday to 14 men for killing a Pakistani citizen during pro-democracy protests led by the Shiite majority this year, the state news agency BNA said.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )

lead_paragraph: Bahrain handed out life sentences on Monday to 14 men for killing a Pakistani citizen during pro-democracy protests led by the Shiite majority this year, the state news agency BNA said.
